document_data.name: Damanda
document_data.mainbody: '''Damanda''' was a [[Talontar blightlord]] [[vampire]] operating in the [[Rawlinswood]] as of {{yearlink|1373}}.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|87|10}} She was the right hand of the [[Talontyr]], whom she served directly.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|117-118|13}}
document_data.Description: She was a thin woman in form-fitting black armor, so tightly articulated that it might as well be a second skin. Her nails were midnight black, matching her lacquered armor.
document_data.Abilities: Being a vampire, she was capable of extracting energy or vitality with her attacks, and of using a gaze that crushed the volition of the living. Furthermore, she could summon to herself an aura of biting, stinging vermin. Her vampiric strength granted her the ability to tear down walls in a pinch. She had some meager capability to cast arcane spells, allowing her to trigger some magical items.
document_data.Relationships: She had four vampire underlings of her own, named Absalme, Bonehammer, [[Ezekial]] and Lex.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|215-217|22}}
